ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
ji ltar na rna ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lce mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar
na lus mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra

mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dri mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ro mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na reg mthong ba ma mchis
pa'i slad du ston lags/ ji ltar na chos mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par

shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston
pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te

reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston
pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg

pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong

ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis mthong ba ma mchis

pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i

slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mye'i khams mthong ba ma mchis
pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes

pa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na

rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
lags/ ji ltar na reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
lags/ ji ltar na len pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na srid pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston

pa lags/ ji ltar na rga shi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du

ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar

na nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa

lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid
mthong ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du
ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
lags/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad

stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i

slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yang dag
par spong ba rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dbang po rnams mthong ba ma mchis
pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan
rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba
ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong
ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma myed pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
smon pa myed pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/

ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma

mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad

du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar
na dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis
pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs la dmyigs

pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'du

shes la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du shes mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'du byed la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston

pa'o/ /nam rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myig la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig

mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rna ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/

sna mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lce la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
lus mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam gzugs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sgra dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sgra mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dri dmyigs pa'i rnam par

shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dri mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ro la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ro mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam reg la dmyigs pa'i rnam

par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam chos la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myig gi rnam par shes

pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i

rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna'i rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lce'i rnam

par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus kyi rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i

tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston

pa'o/ /nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes

pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir

ston pa'o/ /nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par

shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba

myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /

nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam

par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/

lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sa'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam chu'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes

pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chu'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mye'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mye'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rlung

gi khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rlung gi khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam nam mkha'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams

mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam par shes pa'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ma rig pa dmyigs

pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ma rig pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'du byed la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam

par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mying dang gzugs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mying dang

gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam skye mched drug la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye mched drug mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes

pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sred pa la dmyigs pa'i

rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sred pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam len pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ len pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam srid pa la

dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ srid pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam skye ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /

nam rga shi la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rga shi mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i

rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir

ston pa'o/ /nam nang stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam phyi stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/

phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam phyi nang stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam stong pa nyid stong pa

nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam chen po stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chen po

stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam don dam pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'dus byas stong pa

nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /

nam thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa'i stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs

pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid

mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi

'byung ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba

myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes

pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yang dag par spong ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams

mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dbang po la dmyigs
pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dbang po rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam stobs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stobs rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
ston pa'o/ /nam byang chub kyi yan lag la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam bsam gtan la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams

mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshad myed pa rnams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam par thar pa brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam
par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes

pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mngon par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi

'byung ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ting nge 'dzin la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston
pa'o/ /nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmyigs pa'i

rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myi 'jigs pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa rnams mthong

ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam so so yang dag par rig pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam snying rje chen po la

dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ snying rje chen po mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i

phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dgra bcom pa

nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rang byang chub la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang byang chub mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la dmyigs

pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor

gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa zhes rjod de/ 'jig rten du ci

stong pa zhes rjod ce na/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten

du rjod do/ /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myig stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod

do/ /lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /

sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /reg stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chos stong ngo zhes bya bar

'jig rten du rjod do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig

rten du rjod do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du

rjod do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lce'i 'dus

te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /

lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chu'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mye'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du

rjod do/ /rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /nam mkha'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /

ma rig pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mying dang gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar

'jig rten du rjod do/ /skye mched drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten tu rjod do/ /reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sred pa stong ngo

zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /len pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /srid pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /skye ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rga shi

stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du

rjod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du

rjod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
du rjod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong

ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /

dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /

yang dag par spong ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dbang po rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /stobs

rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /bsam gtan rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /gzugs

myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo

zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar

'jig rten du rjod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong ngo zhes bya bar
'jig rten du rjod do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /byams pa chen po stong

ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dgra bcom

nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rang byang chub stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar rjod/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya

bar ji ltar ston ce na/ 'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'du shes stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes

bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sna stong zhes bya
bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar

ston to/ /'jig rten na sgra stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ro stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten
na chos stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sna'i rnam par

shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid kyi rnam par shes

pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong
zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes

bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na
sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na chu'i
khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mye'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar
ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na

rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mying dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na skye mched drug stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig

rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sred pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na len pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na srid pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na skye ba

stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rga shi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na phyi stong pa nyid

stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston

to/ /'jig rten na don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /

'jig rten na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes

bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong

zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong
zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten

na yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na
stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /
'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na tshad myed pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten
na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mngon par shes pa rnams

stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong

zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myi 'jigs bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar

ston to/ /'jig rten na snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong
zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa nyid

stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong

zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/
rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston ce na/
gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston
to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab
ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /
reg gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i

'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig

rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i

'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes

bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa

stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes

bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi

'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi

'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las

'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston

to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig

pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya

bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar

ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom

pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig

rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ /ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong

pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid

stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston

to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston

to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid

stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya

bar ston to/ /mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa

zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

len pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten ngo bo

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig

rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig

stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa
rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig

myed pa dang / /smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs

pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa

la 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos

rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes

zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i

'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed

bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i

'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos

po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong

pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po
myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig

rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos
po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig

rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig

zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong

cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab

nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong

pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /don dam

pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig

rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten

stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa
nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten
stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mngon
par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par
rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
bam po brgyad pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ci ltar ston ce na/ ji nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du
shes su yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu
myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis
myi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems
can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtang ba'i don to/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi phyin pa don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/
rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang /
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang myed de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab
'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du myed de/ sus kyang gzhal bar myi nus so/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs
des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas
mnyam pa yang su yang myed na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams kyi don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo/ /rab 'byor
sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu myed gzhal du myed de/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs
kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab

chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag

du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam

gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig bsam gyis

myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu

ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal

du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
du dri bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi
mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos
bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du

ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/

ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa

dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus

te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis

shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du

lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal

du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/

ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma

mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam

pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
