mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams
bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi
dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mying dang gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi
dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg
pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i
slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs
pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid
bsam gyi myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i
slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid
bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i

slad du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad myed pa
rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs
pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/

gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsam gyis myi
khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa

nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi

mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi

mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam

pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa

dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad

dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sgra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam

pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa

dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chos la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa

ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang

mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag
pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang
tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/

ci'i slad du/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad

du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par
spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du stobs rnams la bsam

pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs
pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/

ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon

par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun
tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du

dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid/ bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi

khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo
bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /

rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig la bsam pa dang dpag

pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa

dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam

pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam

pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam

pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam

pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir

gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/

de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/

de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/

de'i phyir ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa

ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa

ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang

mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu

myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes

pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa la/ bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi

dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang

mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa

la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang

mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab

dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi

dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg

pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang

mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu

myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/

de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid

bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi

dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam

pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa

dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam
pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam

pa ste/ de'i phyir mye'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par
shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam

pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa
dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal

du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mying dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi

khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid

bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor

ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /

rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad

dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag

nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi

dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam

pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /

rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa

rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la

rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang

pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid

rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar kyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed

pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bsam pa dang

dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo
rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi

pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang

mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab

'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang

myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag

pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam

pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam

gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang

dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i

phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu

myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
du sems/ gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes
dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
pa dang mnyam pa de la myig dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmyigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa de la lce dmyigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmyigs su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmyigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis myi
khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmyigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro
dmyigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg dmyigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam
par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg
pa dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te
reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa

dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi

mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa de la sa'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ mye'i
khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mye'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmyigs su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes
pa'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ mying dang gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mying dang gzugs
dmyigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmyigs su yod dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa de la tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmyigs su yod dam/ len pa gang bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa dmyigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa de la srid pa dmyigs su yod dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis myi
khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rga shi dmyigs su yod dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dmyigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod
dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi
khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ don
dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa

de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs
su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su
yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/
myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dngos po myed pa

stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi
khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dbang po rnams dmyigs su yod
dam/ stobs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la stobs rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byang chub kyi yan lag dmyigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang
bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang bsam gyis
myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ tshad myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzugs myed
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar
pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag
la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dmyigs su yod dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa de dag la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ myi 'jigs pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la myi 'jigs pa rnams
dmyigs su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmyigs
su yod dam/ byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byams pa chen po dmyigs su yod dam/ snying rje chen po gang bsam
gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la snying rje chen po dmyigs su yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmyigs su yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi
khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab
dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub dmyigs su
yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ gsol
pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o/ /dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu myed pa'o/ /tshad

dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du myed pa'o/ /mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o/ /
dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu myed pa'o/ /tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du myed pa'o/ /mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa'o/ /rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rab 'byor dpag tu myed ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu myi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas te/ rab
'byor gzhal du myed ces bya ba 'di ni tshad myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rab 'byor myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pa myed pa'i tshig bla dgas te/
rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor bsam gyis myi
khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /dpag tu myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag tu myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhal du myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
gzhal du myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am dpag par myi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal
du myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du myed do/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang dpag tu myed pa dang gzhal du myed pa dang / myi
mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shus nye bar len pa myed
par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge bsnyen stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi myig rnam
par dag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung
bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bzhi'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don
gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
don bsam gyi myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed
pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab

mo 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /stong pa
nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

'dus so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus

so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
'dus so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so/ /dbang po lnga 'dus so/ /stobs lnga 'dus so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so/ /'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so/ /tshad myed pa bzhi 'dus so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
'dus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
'dus so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi
'dus so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so/ /byams pa chen po 'dus so/ /snying rje chen po 'dus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so/ /rgyun tu zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang byang chub 'dus so/ /lam gyi rnam
pa shes pa nyid 'dus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal
po'i dgos pa 'am/ yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur
bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag

thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do/ /rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas
pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ni gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /tshor ba la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'du byed la yongs su
'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /myig la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rna ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sna la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lce la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lus la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /yid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /gzugs la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /dri la yongs
su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /ro la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /reg la yongs su
'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /chos la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye
bar gnas pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang /
mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs
su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lce'i
'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par
nye bar gnas pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su
'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas

pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa
dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus

te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas
pa'o/ /chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /mye'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas
pa'o/ /rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa
myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed
pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa la yongs
su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed
par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sred pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa
myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /len pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /srid pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa
myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /skye ba la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rga shi la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed
par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin
pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang /
mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid
la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed
par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa
dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon
par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong
pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar
gnas pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa
myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /dngos po myed
pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar
gnas pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su
'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /dbang po rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye
bar gnas pa'o/ /stobs rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang /
mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed
par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /tshad myed pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs
su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon
par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa
myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs
su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /
snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon
par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar
gnas pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /rang byang chub la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags
pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub la yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa dang / mngon par chags pa myed par nye bar gnas pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs la yongs su
'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis pa nye
bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin
pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par
nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na myig la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba la yongs su 'dzin
pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sna la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye
bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lce la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lus la yongs su 'dzin pa ma
mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na yid la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas
pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /
mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na dri la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na ro la
yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na reg la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags
pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na chos la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na
myig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma
mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis
par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi
rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis
pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye
bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags
pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na
yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su
'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon
par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar
gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par
chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/
ji ltar na mye'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis
pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa
lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin
pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar
gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs la yongs
su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma
mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba la yongs
su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma
mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na len pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar srid pa la yongs su 'dzin
pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas
pa lags/ ji ltar na rga shi la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa
ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa
ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar
na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /
